name: Sex Story - Ruby and Hunter - Episode 5
name_original: Sex Story - Ruby and Hunter - Episode 5
description:
An erotic Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor.
Ruby and Hunter’s wild Sex Story concludes with an outdoor swingers soiree. The hot couple has just returned home from a date when they catch their naughty maid getting it on with her newest boyfriend on Hunter’s luxurious terrace. They cannot let an opportunity like this slide, so they seduce the hot couple into letting them join the fun.

Game description

Ruby and Hunter’s wild Sex Story has reached its end with a spicy final episode.

EPISODE 5 brings you the hot couple arriving home after a fancy dinner downtown. Hunter’s been waiting all evening to get Ruby naked and feast on that hot heaven between her legs, but the redhead won’t let him have it without a cooling long shower first.
He manages to get her naked anyway, whispering all the dirty things he wants to do to her, but the vixen escapes his hold and runs towards the terrace, planning on diving into the blissful waters of the pool.

Their evening takes a spicy turn when she reaches the back door and spots Hunter’s naughty maid making out with some hot guy outside, unaware of the pair of eyes watching them.
She couldn’t let an opportunity like this slide, and she persuaded her lover to go out there and try to seduce the hot couple into letting them join in their fun.

Will they agree to Ruby’s proposal and indulge in a swingers soiree?
Follow the story and find out.
